City Council
============

[2026 City Council Meeting Schedule](https://www.haslet.org/DocumentCenter/View/5748/2026-City-Council-Meeting-Schedule)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All meeting dates are subject to change. To view upcoming meeting information or agendas, click here: [Agendas & Minutes](https://haslet.civicweb.net/portal/)

![Hulsey Oath](https://www.haslet.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3221)

Pictured: Mayor Gary Hulsey taking the Oath of Office on May 23, 2023.

The governing body of the City of Haslet is comprised of the mayor and five council members. The mayor and council members serve two year terms.

Current City of Haslet council members include:
-----------------------------------------------

* Council Member Place 1 - Doug Horak
* Council Member Place 2 - Chris Carathers
* Council Member Place 3 - James Watkins
* Council Member Place 4 - Zachry Gilbert
* Council Member Place 5, Mayor Pro Tem - Tanya Morrow

To learn more about your council members, click here: [Meet the Council](https://haslet.civicweb.net/portal/members.aspx?id=10).
